title: Scouting duties during preseason, HOF game preview
itunes:title: Scouting duties during preseason, HOF game preview
description:
Football is back! Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks preview the Hall of Fame game by breaking down Lamar Jackson's potential and what to watch for with Matt Nagy's new-look Bears offense (20:06). The guys also cover Pat Mahomes' struggles in practice, Earl Thomas' frustrations in Seattle and Sam Darnold's new contract (1:15). DJ & Bucky cap the show by revealing the highest scouting grades they have ever handed out (27:59) before they take you inside a scout's schedule during the NFL preseason (33:02).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
